name: Dino Digger (dancar)
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 48

A kind of buggy puzzle game where you move pieces of dirt around to find fossils.

The goal of the game is to move all fossils (only 2 right now) up and out of the hole

*** Known bugs ***

- The large dirt tile will not always move where you want it to move...

Constrols:

Left Mouse: Select dirt, move to highlighted destination

Right Mouse: Deselect dirt

R: Restart with a new randomized level

A/D, Left/Right arrow keys: Rotate the camera
